sentences.english: Non -stress test has a higher clinical value in foretelling perinatal prognosis ofp olyhydramnios.
sentences.chinese: 無激惹試驗在其預測圍生兒預後具有較好的臨牀價值。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinicopathological feature and prognosis of meningioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究腦膜瘤臨牀病理特徵及預後。

sentences.english: P16 protein may serve as an important indicator of estimating prognosis of breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: P16可作爲臨牀上判定乳腺癌預後的一個新指標。

sentences.english: Conclusion The prognosis of PHT secondary to rheumatic diseases is pessimistic.
sentences.chinese: 結論風溼性疾病繼發肺動脈高壓預後不良。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the prognostic risk factors of traumatic basal ganglia hematoma (TBGH).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討影響外傷性基底節血腫預後的相關因素。

sentences.english: Conclusion The incident rate of ARF was high in asphyxia neonatorum.
sentences.chinese: 結論窒息新生兒ARF發生率高且預後不良。

sentences.english: The use of amiodarone had no significant effects on the primary quality-of-life outcomes.
sentences.chinese: 應用胺碘酮對主要生命質量預後沒有改善。

sentences.english: It is useful to prevent infarcted hemorrhage for the patients with brain infarction from his recovery.
sentences.chinese: 說明預防腦梗塞後出血對改善患者預後具有重要意義。

sentences.english: The prognosis of diffuse cerebral laceration and diffuse axonal injury was worse.
sentences.chinese: 瀰漫性腦挫裂傷或瀰漫性軸索損傷預後較差。

sentences.english: Electrocardiographic abnormality was associated with the degree of clinical condition and prognosis.
sentences.chinese: 心電圖異常與病情輕重及預後密切相關。

sentences.english: At the 6th month of treatment, the complications and prognosis of patients in all groups were evaluated.
sentences.chinese: 並於6個月對各組患者的併發症及預後進行評定。

sentences.english: It is a self-limited disease and has a benign prognosis.
sentences.chinese: 嗜伊紅性腹膜炎爲一自限性疾病且預後良好。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the influence of Zhenweifang on the muscle tension in flaccid paralysis period and prognosis of stroke.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察振痿方對腦卒中軟癱期肌張力及預後的影響。

sentences.english: To evaluate the clinical factors that affect the prognosis of peripartum cardiomyopathy.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價影響圍產期心肌病預後的臨牀因素。

sentences.english: ObjectiveThe degree of renal tubulointerstitial injury determines the prognosis of renal disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的腎小管間質病變程度是腎臟疾病預後的決定因素。

sentences.english: Prognosis for ependymal cysts is excellent.
sentences.chinese: 室管膜囊腫的預後是良好的。

pinyin: zi4 ti3 mian3 yi4 ji2 bing4

definition: to show an effect/to produce an effect/a conspicuous effect
